Definitely linked

Pretty clearly not a constant offset

Witchwood Cavern:
Region Entrance: 18446741874686296067 1111111111111111111111100000000000000000000000000000000000000011
UID to connect:    534334063796813827      11101101010010101100000000000000000000000000000000000000011
Calc. offset:    17912407810889482240
Witchwood Map UI:              485974

Some nerdlord says this is the offset:
18446741874686296064 
Witchwood Connective UID plus offset: 18981075938483109891
Offset plus map id: 18446741874686782038
Connective ID divided by map id: 1099511627776

BITMASK!!!
Real UID always starts with 23 1s
Fake UID starts with some different pattern
then there is the same bit pattern on both UIDS



Witchwood Cavern:                     12345678901234567890123456789012
Region Entrance: 18446741874686296067 111111111111111111111110 00000000 00000000000000000000000000000011
UID to connect:    534334063796813827 000001110110101001010110 00000000 00000000000000000000000000000011

UID to connect:   2925801541023566983 001010001001101010001001 00000000 00000000000000000000110010000111

DragonCliff
UID to connect:    197244689441620183 000000101011110011000001 00000000 00000000000000000000000011010111
RegionEntrance??:18446741874686296279 111111111111111111111110 00000000 00000000000000000000000011010111
Connective UID
64 bits
0-23: MAP UID

1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890
         0                      24       32                               64
         |----------------------|--------|--------------------------------|
CID	        Map ID	          Zero               Shared Portion
RID        Ones, bit 23 zero      Zero               Shared Portion
